function.name: set_alarm
function.description: The robot will enable the alarm to wake up the user at the right time.

function.name: heat_oven
function.description: The robot will turn on the oven to cook for the user.

function.description: The robot will prepare prepare coffee to the user.

function.name: listening_music

function.name: read_news
function.description: The robot will read newsfeed to the user.

function.name: order_food
function.description: The robot will order food to the user.

function.name: do_nothing
function.description: The robot should not do anything particular.
